attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Traffic calming features do not slow the %age of traffic down, they create noise pollution, and vehicles emmit 10% more emissions, and send  vibrations through the ground damaging properties in the vicinity, disturb peoples sleep, on a regular basis, humps discriminate against disabled people, people with back and neck problems, hump damage vehicle components,especially the suspension.
Humps delay emergency vehicles 10 seconds per hump putting lives at risk.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Nohumps/

Also, if you decide to resubmit the title of the petition must be a call to action, not your names.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
